Summary of tidydata.txt

180 rows and 20 columns. Each row has averaged variables for each subject and each activity.

Only the variables estimated from the mean and standard deviation are in the tidy data set


Column names are:

 [1] "activityId"                     
 [2] "subjectId"                      
 [3] "TimeBodyAccMagnitudeMean"
